title: A Closer Look: Comey Hearing Adds to Chaos of Trump Presidency | Interview: Will Forte
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the FBI's investigation into Russia's interference in the presidential election, and President Trump's wiretapping claims.
Then, Seth talks to his old friend Will Forte, who created and stars in "The Last Man on Earth," about his nickname Uncle Stinky, and his on-set challenge with co-star Mary Steenburgen. Then, in a podcast exclusive, he tells a few more stories backstage about an unfortunate poison oak rash and more to Late Night producer Kevin Miller.
